page.title: Juniper Earnings Rise
page.text: CHICAGO (Reuters) - Network equipment maker Juniper Networks Inc. <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=JNPR.O target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">JNPR.O</A> on Thursday said quarterly earnings rose, driven by good results in its mainstay routing and security markets.
